review:
I never thought of writing a review for Dr Shikha, but felt compulsion to do so when I realised quality of dental treatment I got from her.  She suggested me to go for root canal on my 5 teeth which were damaged by deep cavities. I opted for treatment but got only 3 root canal done on my choice and thought of getting other two done later. I got these treated too at a dentist close to my place, as I never felt anything great about my first 3 root canal treatment.
A year later I developed pain in that side of treatment and I was advised a CT scan by my second dentist. I got my CT done and all my root canals were evaluated. The CT guy told me “He has rarely seen such high quality root canal treatment on CBCT”, he was referring to root canals done by Dr Shikha and suggested my other two root canals has failed and there was pus formation and that the procedure was done incompletely.
Not left with a choice I went back to Dr Shikha, got root canal again on my two teeth and realized the instruments and equipment used by her were not seen at my second dentist, leave away the facility of root canal under microscope. Every five minutes in procedure a new fancy instrument was used, and she never hesitated to explain the utility of these gadgets.
Charges too were only marginally higher than my other dentist, but I don’t want to pay again for choosing someone who is not expert. All through my second visit Shikha mam never commented or said anything about my second dentist. She is a very humble, dedicated, and very advanced dental specialist and she will definitely add some “wow” in her signature treatment style.

My problem was I felt little pain on my molar tooth. Also I saw it was a bit loose.
At age of 24, Is it my milk tooth or my permanent tooth. I don't know.
I asked my friend and was advised to see a doctor.

I read a lot of articles and watched youtube videos before making this decision to actually visit the doctor. It filled my mind with too many questions.

Questions like:
1. I came to know even after doing brush regularly one can develop gum disease.
2. Gum disease is caused due to depositions on teeth actually on those places where toothbrush don't reach. Gum disease affects gums and eventually you loose that tooth forever.
You are left with a void that is a permanent.

Most important question:
How can you enjoy your favourite food without teeth?

I browsed for symptoms for gum disease that were like
1. bleeding gums
2. bad breath
3. loose teeth
4. puffy gums

Still not sure I had little pain in my molar teeth then and now plus it is a bit loose.
It is good if you act early.

So I visited this doctor. She handled me very politely. I had many questions in my mind and I got all of them answered.

She checked my tooth and told the gums are in good condition. My molar tooth is being hold fine by my gums. My case is of sensitivity. I have lost my enamel on the molar tooth and that was a shock for me. It is maybe because of crushing my teeth one against the other.

Also one must also not brush hard because you want your teeth to shine. It is because of the deposits that harden over time. If you brush hard you will lose enamel that is given just once by the mother nature.

She told me if you can do anything now is remove the deposits that is a machine cleaning process by the doctor. One must approach for this cleaning every 6 months or one year.

This ensures
1. keeps in check the deposits on teeth unreachable by tooth brush.
2. deposits on check means decreasing the chances of gum diseases and subsequently fear of loosing your precious tooth.

Visiting the doctor was fruitful because I came to know:
1. I don't have any kind of gum disease.
2. The tooth I am having right now are all permanent and I should not expect any tooth to  sprout out if I loose any of my tooth.
3. My case of sensitivity and valuable information so I could prevent my teeth from further damage caused due to my ignorance in first place.

Best coffee is not served in STARBUCKS only, similar is my experience with Dr Shikha. I had severe bruxism due to which i went for crowns on all my teeth at a very early age over years they had worn down and I was willing to go for metal free crowns. I initially visited dr shikha for consultation and was impressed by her recommendations but still was not sure to get the work done from her. Thought of visiting fancy clinic but finally decided for Dr shikha. I had  zirconia crowns all work completed in 3 days.  Perfect chewing and looks. 
Thanks

She is a very good doctor who gave a very genuine advice regarding the type of crown & filling i should go in for. It's not so common to come across a doctor who would care. Quite clean in her work & dealings with a straight forward approach. 

She explained me the process and suggested me the options that i could go in for & helped me understand about the zirconian crown. 

Very professional approach (& by that I don't mean insensitive) which was impressive. The clinic was neat and I didn't have any hangups to suspend my trust.

A big thank you Doctor for your good work !!

I had visited a different doctor before I found about Dr. Shikha Goel, the other doctor did not even mention about my wisdom tooth arrival and recommended filling without considering anything. However, I was not convinced and consulted Dr. Shikha, she is the one reliable doctor and will suggest you treatment in the most ethical way. She explained me about the onset process of wisdom tooth, checked me thoroughly and prescribed me antibiotic for minor infection treatment.  I would recommend all my friends and family to visit her for any dental problem. Thank You Doctor. My best wishes :)

I was  desirous of having a quality treatment and hence was looking for a dentist who can deliver that. My visit to Goel Dental was a result of good reviews on Google and practo. I received first hand information about Dr shikha through her comprehensive website. During my treatment I could feel the difference between a doctor and a specialised doctor and Dr Shikha was exceptionally good in root canal treatment. My bridge was delivered after a thorough trial and only after I approved the color and shape.
I could sense the difference how a general clinic and a specialist's clinic is equipped. There was facility for full mouth xray and modernisation in form of microscope. I opted for microscopic root canal and fillings. 
 I take pleasure in recommending Goel Dental to everyone in search of good dentist.

Ever since I had a crown placed two years back at a very busy dentist my gum have been red and angry as if it is swollen and crown was never perfect but that fellow never considered my problem and always pacified me with words. 
When I could not take it anymore I visited Dr shikha clinic and as soon as she removed my crown pain and heaviness was half gone, she asked me to remain like this for seven days and my gum was happy in that time. Further a crown was given which was exceptional in looks and feel. I am back to a normal life and my new crown is just to perfect.

I required a lot of dental work to be up and about but lack of time and not knowing any dentist held me back. I reached Dr Shikha through practo and read a quite a lot of reviews about her. During all my visits that I had with her I felt every word written about her and her work was true. Any how I am very satisfied after getting all my treatment.
One thing I noticed is that she is genuinely priced and offers  a lot of options for treatment and explains everything with clarity that helps  in decision making.
I sincerely thank Dr shikha for her commitment.

Probably I received every possible dental treatment at Goel dental clinic, it consisted of fillings, root canal, crowns, one implant, gum surgery and a few others. My case was very systematic, planned and meticulous and executed with great precision and politeness. Initially I visited a big hospital but was not satisfied with the approach. Dr shikha has tremendous diagnosis and ability to convey this to patient like me who are interested in understanding their problem. 
I am immensely satisfied with the treatment and wish her success and prosperity in her coming years.

After hours of severe pain that has been termed cured and billed by a general dentist I have visited Goel Dental Clinic for an urgent treatment of very same tooth. Doctor attended me on time, did x ray and examined through microscope. I was demonstrated how my previous treatment was inaccurate and further treatment was explained. My entire root canal was redone which took several visits but I was pain free in end. If I would have come to this place earlier I could have saved lot of my time, money and frustration.
Over my visits I have realised Dr shikha is not in a hurry to treat more number of patients but treat every patient thoroughly, accurately and completly. She is a very very advanced dentist.

Visit to Goel Dental was an unplanned visit. I just visited clinic for price enquiry and after one hour I was walking out with two dental implants in my mouth. Goel Dental is very equipped, modern and laced with capacities to execute dental treatment of complex nature.  And for sure I saved a lot by getting treatment from Goel Dental.
